title: Service Failure Report
description: This Workflow generates Service Failure reports and emails to the specified addresses.
guide:
# Service Failure Report
Get a list of your top failed Services. This Workflow queries Grail and provides data to Dynatrace Assist to get recommendations. These recommendations are then sent to email(s) of your choice.

# Setup
1. Change emails (`to`, `cc`, `bcc`) to be an array of strings.
2. Test with a manual Run, by click the `Run` button.
3. If everything works as expected, change the [Trigger](?trigger=) to a schedule, e.g. Weekly, Daily, etc.

# More advanced interactions
Consider using our MCP server, [local](https://github.com/dynatrace-oss/dynatrace-mcp) or [remote](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/discover-dynatrace/platform/davis-ai/dynatrace-mcp ).

tenant.name: tenant

input.query:
fetch dt.entity.environment
| fields URL=concat("[Open in Dynatrace](http://",dt.system.environment,".apps.dynatrace.com/ui/apps/dynatrace.services/explorer?perspective=performance&sort=healthIndicators%3Adescending)")
| limit 1

tenant.description: Make use of Dynatrace Grail data in your workflow.

service_failures.name: service_failures

input.query:
timeseries {
  failure_count = sum(dt.service.request.failure_count, scalar: true),
  request_count = sum(dt.service.request.count, scalar: true)
}, by: { dt.entity.service }, from: now()-7d, to: now()
| fieldsAdd service_name = entityName(dt.entity.service)
| fieldsAdd failure_rate = (failure_count / request_count) * 100
| filter failure_count > 0
| sort failure_count desc
| limit 20
| fields `Service` = service_name, `Failure Count` = failure_count, `Request Count` = request_count, `Failure Rate` = concat( round(failure_rate, decimals:2),"%")

service_failures.description: Make use of Dynatrace Grail data in your workflow.

input.subject: Service Failure Report

service_error_report_prompt.name: service_error_report_prompt

input.prompt:
Provide a markdown report for the following use case:
## Service Failure Report
input.instruction: Instead of bulleted list, format Services in a table.
input.supplementary:
Use this analysis for the past 24 hours:
{{result("service_failures")["records"]}}

service_error_report_prompt.description: Prompt the Dynatrace Intelligence generative AI
